sentences.english: The induced-flotation behavior of chalcopyrite and pyrite was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 考察了黄铜矿和黄铁矿的诱导浮选行为。

sentences.english: The Pyrite is one of main typomorphic characteristic of W-Sb-Au deposits series of western Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 黄铁矿是湘西钨锑金矿床系列的主要标型矿物之一。

sentences.english: The pyroelectricity characteristics of pyrite can be used as the indicators for prospecting of gold deposit.
sentences.chinese: 黄铁矿的热电性特征可作为金矿的找矿标志。

sentences.english: The pulp concentration has effect on the leaching rate of pyrrhotite and marmatite.
sentences.chinese: 矿浆浓度对磁黄铁矿和铁闪锌矿的细菌浸出有影响。

sentences.english: After the pyrolysis coking process, the pyrrhotite was the main form of the catalyst residual.
sentences.chinese: 经过热解制焦后，催化剂残留的主要形态是磁黄铁矿。

sentences.english: These minerals serve as indicators of pyrites related to gold mineralization.
sentences.chinese: 黄铁矿是主要的载金矿物。

sentences.english: It was proved there existed the direct effect when pyrrhotite was leached by thiobacillus ferrooxidans.
sentences.chinese: 生物浸出磁黄铁矿的过程中存在细菌的直接作用。

sentences.english: This paper deals firstly with the distribution of pyrites in coals.
sentences.chinese: 首先揭示了煤中黄铁矿的分布赋存规律。

sentences.english: The Na 2S-induced flotation behavior of chalcopyrite and pyrite has been investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了黄铜矿，黄铁矿的硫化钠诱导浮选行为。

sentences.english: Pyrite occuritig in the Mashan magnetite-pyrite deposit is a common mineral of hydrothermal process.
sentences.chinese: 马山铁硫矿床中黄铁矿为热液作用下的常见矿物。

sentences.english: The rate of oxidation reaction of pyrites increased.
sentences.chinese: 黄铁矿的氧化速率增大。

sentences.english: The adsorption process of xanthate on the surfaces of arsenopyrite and pyrite was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了毒砂和黄铁矿表面吸附黄药的过程。

sentences.english: The gold bearing minerals of Zimudang gold deposit are mainly arsenic bearing pyrite and arsenopyrite.
sentences.chinese: 紫木凼金矿床主要载金矿物为含砷黄铁矿和毒砂。

sentences.english: Pyrite and quartz are the main gold bearing minerals in Daqingling gold deposit.
sentences.chinese: 黄铁矿和石英是大庆岭金矿的主要载金矿物。

sentences.english: Pyrite-bearing sulfide quartz veins are favourable prospecting criteria.
sentences.chinese: 含黄铁矿硫化物石英脉是有利的找矿标志。

sentences.english: Why does pyrite have such a strong capacity of adsorbing nanometer sized gold?
sentences.chinese: 为什么黄铁矿对纳米金的吸附作用强？

definition: rutile (mineral form of titanium oxide TiO2)
